translation.en: Hello?
-[man 1] Turn him over. -[man 2] Is he alive?
[woman] Can you hear me?
Hey.
Hey. Where are you? I've been calling for an hour.
translation.it: Dove sei? Ti sto chiamando da un'ora.

translation.en: Lorna, you're not my wife anymore.
translation.it: Lorna, non sei più mia moglie.

translation.en: Thanks for that, Mick,
I still get confused. Some days, I think I am your wife.
translation.it: A volte mi confondo e credo di essere tua moglie,

translation.en: Others, I'm more like your mother.
Don't do that. Think I can't tell when you're holding the phone away?
translation.it: Non farlo. Credi non sappia quando allontani il telefono?

translation.en: What I am is a person who runs this practice,
translation.it: Io sono quella che manda avanti lo studio,

translation.en: what's left of it anyway,
and as such, I need to be able to reach you.
Okay, you reached me. What's the problem?
[Lorna] We got a call from Judge Holder.
-She wants to meet with you ASAP. -The Chief Judge?
Technically, the presiding judge. Tell me you're not sleeping with her.
translation.it: Tecnicamente, presidente. Dimmi che non ci fai sesso.

translation.en: No. Why would you even say that?
The only reason you'd be called to the private chambers of a female judge
translation.it: Un giudice donna ti convocherebbe nel suo ufficio

translation.en: is, A, you have a case before her, or B, you have a personal relationship.
translation.it: solo se avessi un caso con lei o una storia con lei

translation.en: And since you haven't had any cases for a year…
translation.it: e, visto che non hai casi da un anno…

translation.en: I never even met the woman.
-She wants to meet with you now. -But she didn't say what it was about?
translation.it: - Vuole vederti subito. - Non ti ha detto a che pro?

translation.en: No. But can we please allow for the possibility
translation.it: No, ma possiamo presumere che sia

translation.en: this might be positive?
Maybe she wants to assign you a case pro bono.
translation.it: Forse vuole assegnarti un caso pro bono.

translation.en: -Work begets work. -Well, maybe.
Still here.
Drive one of the Lincolns.
They're in storage.
Get one out of storage. The Lincoln becomes you.
translation.it: Prendine una. La Lincoln fa parte di te.

translation.en: And you become you.
translation.it: E ti farà tornare in te.

translation.en: Should this present as a real opportunity, you gotta go in there full Mickey Haller.
translation.it: Se fosse un'opportunità di lavoro, devono vedere il vero Mickey Haller.

translation.en: All right.
Hey!
Hey.
You've got Hayley tonight. Just calling to remind.
translation.it: Stasera hai tu Hayley. Volevo ricordartelo.

translation.en: 'Cause you think I'll forget?
Six o'clock, okay? Not 6:10. Not 6:05.
translation.it: Alle 18:00 in punto, ok? Non le 18:10 o le 18:05.

translation.en: Who's the lucky guy? Do I know him?
translation.it: Chi è il fortunato? Lo conosco?

translation.en: 6:00 p.m. sharp, Mickey.
[Mickey] I got it.
Hey, what can you tell me about Judge Mary Holder?
translation.it: Ehi, cosa sai del giudice Mary Holder?

translation.en: Why?
I don't know. She called me to her chambers.
translation.it: Mi ha convocato nel suo ufficio.

translation.en: -Did you do something? -No, I haven't done something.
translation.it: - Hai fatto qualcosa? - Non ho fatto niente.

translation.en: Then why would she call you to chambers?
I don't know, which is why I'm asking. What can you tell me about her?
translation.it: Non lo so. Per questo te lo chiedo. Cosa sai dirmi di lei?

translation.en: She's got a bug up her ass the size of the legal canon of ethics,
which makes me think you've done something.
-Thanks. -Wait, Mickey--
I'll see you tonight.
He's done something.
[Lorna] Oh, hello, Mick.
-Lorna. -I was driving this way anyway.
-No. You're checking up. -[Lorna] Says who?
You look good. I have always loved this one.
What are you doing here?
This could be a very big deal.
She's the presiding judge. So I came down to gather intel.
translation.it: È il presidente della Corte. Ho raccolto informazioni.

translation.en: And?
Most of her work is administrative, which judge goes where and so forth.
translation.it: Gestisce questioni amministrative, come assegnare i giudici.

translation.en: [Mickey] And?
And… she assigns cases.
-If that's what this is about… -You don't want me to blow it.
translation.it: - Se sei qui per questo… - Non vuoi che rovini tutto.

translation.en: I'm just saying, whatever this is, it has to go well. Okay?
translation.it: Dico solo che di qualunque cosa si tratti deve andare bene, ok?

translation.en: [Holder] Mr. Haller, I presume.
Judge Holder.
I don't believe we've met before.
No, Your Honor.
Well, come on then.
The Lincoln Lawyer, that what they call you?
translation.it: L'avvocato delle Lincoln. La chiamano così?

translation.en: Some do, yes.
Or did.
Why?
Mainly worked out of my car. Going from court to court.
translation.it: Lavoravo soprattutto in auto. Tra un tribunale e l'altro.

translation.en: All the driving and so forth.
Being ready to flee the jurisdiction if need be.
translation.it: Pronto a fuggire in caso di bisogno?

translation.en: Never fled the jurisdiction.
Have a seat.
What's your relationship with Jerry Vincent?
translation.it: Qual è il suo rapporto con Jerry Vincent?

translation.en: Uh, I used to go up against him back when he was a prosecutor.
translation.it: Ero alla difesa quando lui era pubblico ministero.

translation.en: And he switched sides.
He was murdered last night.
Excuse me?
Shot dead in his car.
What?
If you were close, please accept my condolences,
but that's not why you're here.
translation.it: ma non l'ho convocata per questo.

translation.en: Were you close?
I mean, friendly. Colleagues, mostly.
He left you his practice.
translation.it: Le ha lasciato i suoi casi.

translation.en: I beg your pardon?
Mr. Vincent filed a motion with the court ten days ago
translation.it: Vincent ha presentato istanza dieci giorni fa

translation.en: that allowed for the transfer of his entire practice to you,
translation.it: per lasciarle tutti i suoi casi

translation.en: should he become incapacitated or deceased.
translation.it: in caso di problemi o decesso.

translation.en: -He never discussed this with you? -No.
Well, last night he became deceased, which means what was his is now yours.
translation.it: Beh, ieri notte è deceduto e ora i suoi casi vanno a lei.

translation.en: Including the Trevor Elliott trial.
You have heard of that?
The tech guy who killed his wife and her boyfriend.
translation.it: L'informatico che ha ucciso moglie e amante?

translation.en: Allegedly.
Of course.
That's now my case?
translation.it: E ora quel caso è mio?

translation.en: They're all your cases, Mr. Haller.
You might not get to keep them.
translation.it: Non è detto che potrà tenerli.

translation.en: Every client has a right to move on to another attorney
translation.it: Ogni cliente avrà il diritto di cambiare avvocato

translation.en: once apprised of Mr. Vincent's demise.
What it does mean is you get first shot.
translation.it: Lei avrà solo la possibilità di convincerli.

translation.en: Assuming I'm satisfied that Mr. Vincent's clients
are being transferred to a replacement counsel
translation.it: i clienti di Vincent a un sostituto

translation.en: of good standing and competent skill.
As far as I can tell,
you haven't had any cases in quite some time.
translation.it: lei non lavora da un po'.

translation.en: Yeah. [clears throat] I was in an accident about 18 months ago.
translation.it: Ho avuto un incidente circa 18 mesi fa.

translation.en: Surfing, if you can believe it.
translation.it: Sembra assurdo, ma mentre facevo surf.

translation.en: I had multiple surgeries and, well, there were complications.
translation.it: Ho subito diversi interventi e ci sono state delle complicazioni.

translation.en: Complications?
I took painkillers. Got addicted to 'em. But that's over now. I got help.
translation.it: Una dipendenza dagli antidolorifici, ma mi sono fatto aiutare ed è finita.

translation.en: Got clean. So whatever concerns you may have about my reputation, I--
translation.it: Sono pulito. Se ha dubbi sulla mia reputazione, io…

translation.en: It's my reputation I'm concerned about. I'm the one that has to sign off on you.
translation.it: È della mia reputazione che mi preoccupo. Spetta a me autorizzarla.

translation.en: Or not.
Why you?
Of all the lawyers out there.
Honestly, Your Honor, I have no idea.
translation.it: Onestamente, Vostro Onore, non ne ho idea.

translation.en: Well, if you were to guess?
Well, as I said, Jerry and I were friendly,
translation.it: Tra me e Jerry c'era un bel rapporto.

translation.en: we trusted each other.
And second, though this is subjective,
translation.it: E, anche se può essere soggettivo,

translation.en: when I am right, there's no better criminal defense attorney in Los Angeles
translation.it: quando sto bene non c'è miglior penalista a Los Angeles

translation.en: and Jerry knew that from personal experience.
translation.it: e Jerry lo sapeva per esperienza personale.

translation.en: And you think you're right now?
translation.it: E crede di star bene, ora?

translation.en: I do.
This is an order
transferring Mr. Vincent's practice to you.
translation.it: cedo a lei i casi dell'avvocato Vincent.

translation.en: I can rescind it just as fast.
I will be monitoring you, Mr. Haller.
I want an updated inventory of cases by the beginning of next week.
translation.it: Voglio l'elenco aggiornato dei casi entro la prossima settimana.

translation.en: After that, a bi-weekly status update
translation.it: E dopo dovrà aggiornarmi ogni due settimane

translation.en: of every case on which you will remain counsel.
translation.it: su ciascun caso che continuerà a seguire.

translation.en: -Am I clear? -I won't let you down, Your Honor.
translation.it: - Sono stata chiara? - Non la deluderò.

translation.en: Don't let your clients down.
I suggest you get to Mr. Vincent's office right now.
translation.it: Le suggerisco di andare subito nello studio di Vincent.

translation.en: The police are, no doubt, searching it
and probably invading their privacy as we speak.
translation.it: e starà invadendo la privacy dei clienti.

translation.en: Thank you, Your Honor.
Good luck, Mr. Haller.
Well, did you get a case?
translation.it: Allora? Ti ha assegnato un caso?

translation.en: I just got a lot of them.
Including Trevor Elliott.
What?
I need to meet the clients,
get their sign-offs, but I might be back, Lorna.
translation.it: accettarmi o no, ma potrei ricominciare.

translation.en: I might actually be back.
What did I tell you about positive visualization?
You wake up, not a single client.
Now, you are repping a guy like Trevor Elliott in a murder trial.
translation.it: e ora difenderai Trevor Elliott in un processo per omicidio.

translation.en: If he decides to keep me.
[Lorna] Positive thinking, Mickey. Positive thinking.
-Floor is closed, folks. -We have business on this floor.
translation.it: - Questo piano è chiuso. - Siamo qui per lavoro.

translation.en: -Not today, you don't. -Talk to the judge.
translation.it: - Non oggi. - Lo dica al giudice.

translation.en: Need to see some ID.
You know, you don't help yourselves being dicky-do's.
translation.it: Sa, non dovete essere sempre così odiosi.

translation.en: Just saying.
-Can I help you? -Mickey Haller. I'm an attorney.
translation.it: - Posso esserle utile? - Mickey Haller. Avvocato.

translation.en: I've taken over Mr. Vincent's practice.
translation.it: Ho rilevato i casi di Vincent.

translation.en: You need to come back tomorrow. This is a crime scene. It's sealed off.
translation.it: Dovrà tornare domani. Questa è la scena di un crimine.

translation.en: The crime scene was a parking garage, not this office.
translation.it: La scena del crimine è un parcheggio, non questo ufficio.

translation.en: There are client files here I need to access and apparently safeguard.
translation.it: Qui ci sono i dossier dei clienti che devo salvaguardare.

translation.en: What'd you say your name was?
Mickey Haller. This is Lorna Crane. She works with me.
translation.it: Mickey Haller. Lei è Lorna Crane. Lavora con me.

translation.en: Well, Mickey Haller and Lorna Crane,
translation.it: Beh, Mickey Haller e Lorna Crane,

translation.en: I need you to both leave. Now.
-Dicky-do's, I'm telling you. -What was that?
translation.it: - Lo dicevo. Odioso. - Come ha detto?

translation.en: That wasn't meant for you. But if you heard me, you heard me.
translation.it: Non mi riferivo a lei, ma se mi ha sentito…

translation.en: You're contaminating a crime scene. You can't be here.
translation.it: Contaminate la scena del crimine. Dovete andarvene.

translation.en: This order will confirm I've been appointed
by the presiding judge of the Superior Court
translation.it: da parte del presidente della Corte Superiore

translation.en: as replacement counsel to Jerry Vincent's clients.
translation.it: come sostituto per i clienti di Jerry Vincent.

translation.en: That means his cases are now my cases,
translation.it: Quindi ora i suoi casi sono miei

translation.en: and you have no right to be in here looking through files.
translation.it: e lei non ha il diritto di ficcarci il naso.

translation.en: That's attorney-client privilege.
Mr. Vincent's been murdered. The motive could be in one of these files.
translation.it: Vincent è stato ucciso e forse il movente è nei dossier.

translation.en: -Even if that were the case-- -Counselor--
Just read the order, Detective. Your crime scene is out in the garage
translation.it: Legga l'ordine. La scena del crimine è il parcheggio

translation.en: and no judge in LA would extend it to this office and these files.
translation.it: e nessun giudice di LA la estenderebbe allo studio.

translation.en: You say this gives you all of Mr. Vincent's cases?
translation.it: Con questa nomina i casi di Vincent diventano suoi?

translation.en: That's right.
-Then that puts you on our list. -Come again.
Our suspect list.
He's dead and you get the whole business?
translation.it: Lui muore e lei ottiene i suoi casi?

translation.en: That's motive, ask me.
Care to tell us where you were last night between 8:00 and midnight?
translation.it: Può dirci dov'era ieri sera tra le 20:00 e mezzanotte?

translation.en: You got me, Detective. You got me.
I killed Jerry. Case closed, everybody.
translation.it: Ho ucciso io Jerry. Il caso è chiuso, gente.

translation.en: Clearly you've done this before.
Are you gonna get out of here, or do I need to call the judge?
translation.it: Ora se ne va o devo chiamare il giudice?

translation.en: Yeah.
-Guys. -Nice to meet you, too.
-Bye. -[detective] Let's go.
Leave everything.
What?
All right. Come on.
[Lorna] Sometimes I think they teach it in the academy,
translation.it: A volte penso che in accademia gli insegnino

translation.en: how to piss people off.
When you think of all the bad blood between the people and police,
translation.it: Se pensi all'astio che c'è tra cittadini e polizia,

translation.en: you'd think "how not to piss people off" would be in the curriculum.
translation.it: "far incazzare il prossimo" dev'essere nel curriculum.

translation.en: How would you feel about me hiring Cisco?
He's a good investigator. One of the best I've worked with.
translation.it: È un bravo investigatore. Il migliore che conosco.

translation.en: Working with your ex-wife is one thing,
hiring her boyfriend is pushing it, even for you.
translation.it: ma assumerne il fidanzato è troppo anche per te.

translation.en: If Trevor Elliott decides to keep me,
I'm gonna need to move fast
with an investigator I can trust, and Cisco--
translation.it: con un investigatore di cui mi fido e Cisco…

translation.en: Yeah, Mickey Haller.
Yes, sir. 2:00 p.m. As in 2:00 p.m. today?
Yes, sir, I'll be there. Thank you.
Who was that?
[sighs] It's Judge Canter's clerk. It seems Jerry has a trial today.
translation.it: Il cancelliere del giudice Canter. Oggi Jerry aveva un processo.

translation.en: -What? -Yep.
-Are you gonna eat your sandwich? -No, Lorna, you can have it.
translation.it: - Non mangi il panino? - No, Lorna. Mangialo tu.

translation.en: Thank you. Run.
Hey.
-I'm covering for Jerry Vincent. -Oh, I heard.
Sorry. What's the name?
And your client's name?
Right.
It's, uh… Letts, first name Izzy.
I think it's a theft.
That would be Marc Daniels,
who I'm covering for, so that's actually mine.
translation.it: ma lo sostituisco io, quindi il caso è mio.

translation.en: -Grand theft, by the by. -Obviously I'm gonna need a continuance.
translation.it: - Furto di preziosi. - Ovviamente mi servirà un rinvio.

translation.en: Obviously I'm not gonna give it to you.
-What? -I got out-of-town witnesses.
translation.it: - Cosa? - Ho dei testimoni di fuori città.

translation.en: I'd rather they be pissed off with the judge or you than me,
translation.it: Preferisco che si arrabbino col giudice o con lei,

translation.en: especially if I wanna get them back.
[woman] LA-292587. People vs. Izzy Letts.
translation.it: LA-292587. Lo Stato contro Izzy Letts.

translation.en: And we're on.
Sarah Shepard for the People, Judge. Ready for trial.
translation.it: Sarah Shepard per l'accusa, giudice. Sono pronta.

translation.en: Mickey Haller for the defendant, Your Honor.
translation.it: Mickey Haller per la difesa, Vostro Onore.

translation.en: I'll be with you in one second. May I approach?
Your Honor, Mr. Vincent unexpectedly passed yesterday.
translation.it: Vostro Onore, il sig. Vincent è deceduto ieri

translation.en: I'm filing in.
My sincere condolences. When will you be ready?
translation.it: Condoglianze. Per quando può essere pronto?

translation.en: -Well… -[Wallace] Don't be greedy.
It's a bench trial with two witnesses.
translation.it: Non c'è giuria e ci sono due testimoni.

translation.en: [Sarah] Out-of-town witnesses, who I'll lose with a continuance.
translation.it: Non sono di qui e potrei perderli, se rinviamo.

translation.en: How's tomorrow?
Tomorrow?
Look at the file.
If you feel like you can't be ready, let me know.
translation.it: e se pensa di non farcela mi avvisi.

translation.en: Step back.
This case is continued until tomorrow, 10:00 a.m.
translation.it: Il caso è rinviato a domani alle 10:00.

translation.en: -Wait, what? -Sir?
Your Honor, we flew down here from San Francisco.
translation.it: Vostro Onore, veniamo da San Francisco.

translation.en: -This is not fair. -I'm afraid we have an emergency.
translation.it: - Non è giusto. - C'è stata un'emergenza.

translation.en: What about the victims? We had an emergency.
translation.it: E le vittime? L'emergenza è la nostra.

translation.en: My wife was attacked, for God's sake.
She had her necklace violently snatched off her person.
translation.it: Le hanno strappato di forza una collana dal collo.

translation.en: [Wallace] And the court is sympathetic, but it's unavoidable.
translation.it: E la Corte capisce, ma è inevitabile.

translation.en: This case is pushed over until tomorrow at 10:00 a.m.
translation.it: Il caso è rinviato a domani alle 10:00.

translation.en: Victims have no rights in this process.
-Yeah. Excuse me. -That's what she stole?
translation.it: - Permesso. - È quello l'oggetto del furto?

translation.en: At least your client has taste.
-Mickey Haller. I'm your attorney. -Where's Jerry?
translation.it: - Mickey Haller. Il suo avvocato. - Dov'è Jerry?

translation.en: Why don't we go someplace we can talk?
translation.it: Andiamo a parlare da qualche parte.

translation.en: [Izzy] He was such a nice man.
He wasn't even charging me.
At least, not yet.
Why would somebody kill him?
I don't know. The police are still gathering evidence.
translation.it: Non lo so. La polizia sta indagando.

translation.en: What kind of world is this?
translation.it: Che razza di mondo è questo?

translation.en: I got to be ready on your case by tomorrow.
translation.it: Devo studiare il suo caso entro domani.

translation.en: -So anything-- -I did not attack her.
I snatched the necklace and ran. I did not attack her.
translation.it: Le ho strappato la collana e sono fuggita. Non l'ho aggredita.

translation.en: Okay. And is there a reason Jerry didn't try to plead this?
translation.it: Ok. E perché Jerry non ha patteggiato?

translation.en: 'Cause they wanted two years. And Jerry said it was excessive.
translation.it: Hanno chiesto due anni e secondo Jerry erano troppi.

translation.en: He thought with a trial, I could at least impress the judge
translation.it: Pensava che andando a processo avrei convinto il giudice

translation.en: with my extenuating circumstances.
Which are?
I'm a good person. Who had a drug problem.
translation.it: Sono una brava persona. Avevo una dipendenza.

translation.en: It wasn't me who stole that necklace,
translation.it: Non ho rubato io quella collana,

translation.en: so much as somebody I don't even recognize.
translation.it: ma qualcuno che ora stento a riconoscere

translation.en: Somebody who's gone.
I went through rehab.
I'm in recovery.
I believe you.
But I don't know if that other person's ever really gone.
translation.it: Ma non so se l'altra persona sia sparita per sempre.

translation.en: Mine was oxy.
You?
Same, basically.
Heroin.
Which I switched to when I couldn't afford the oxy anymore.
translation.it: Ho iniziato quando non potevo permettermi l'ossicodone.

translation.en: So, Jerry planned to put you up there?
And introduce my good personhood status into evidence.
translation.it: Voleva convincere il giudice che sono una brava persona.

translation.en: [Lorna] The trial is tomorrow, you say?
Bench trial, two witnesses. I think I'm good.
translation.it: Niente giuria, due testimoni. Andrà bene.

translation.en: Call Marvin Beedleman, tell him I need a favor.
He's pushing 80, you might have to remind him he owes me.
translation.it: Se usa la scusa dei suoi 80 anni digli che mi deve un favore.

translation.en: Got anything on Trevor Elliott?
Jerry took a retainer of $625,000, most of which seems to be gone.
translation.it: Jerry ha avuto un anticipo di 625.000 dollari che non ci sono più

translation.en: He's due another 450 at trial. Non-refundable.
translation.it: e doveva riceverne altri 450.000. Non rimborsabili.

translation.en: -Wow. -I know. It's like a year's worth of DUIs.
translation.it: Lo so. Un anno di multe per guida in stato d'ebbrezza.

translation.en: It's a franchise case.
-Who's the judge? -James P. Stanton.
translation.it: - Chi è il giudice? - James P. Stanton.

translation.en: He's an ex-defense attorney, so that's good. Are you almost there?
translation.it: Un ex avvocato difensore ed è un bene. Sei arrivato?

translation.en: -Your appointment's at 3:00. -I'm pulling up.
Do we know for sure Elliott hasn't already hired another lawyer?
translation.it: Sicura che Elliott non abbia già assunto un altro avvocato?

translation.en: Don't worry about any other lawyer. Just go.
translation.it: Non preoccuparti degli altri avvocati. Vai.

translation.en: All right.
Hey.
Your name?
Nice car, man.
Thanks.
-Thank you. -[valet] I got it.
Mr. Haller.
Go right up. He's waiting for you.
Sure you don't need anything? Water…
I'm fine. Thank you.
Mr. Elliott's in his office?
translation.it: Il sig. Elliott è in ufficio?

translation.en: His office? [chuckles] No.
[Mickey] Mr. Elliott.
Mickey Haller. How you doing?
Mr. Elliott?
[Trevor] I stand trial for murder next week.
translation.it: Un processo per omicidio tra una settimana

translation.en: My attorney's just been shot dead.
translation.it: e hanno ucciso il mio avvocato.

translation.en: You can probably imagine how I might be doing.
Do they know anything? Any suspects?
Not to my knowledge, no.
I'm told they wanna interview all of his clients.
translation.it: Pare che interrogheranno tutti i suoi clienti.

translation.en: Obviously, I wouldn't advise you talk to them
while this other matter is pending.
What, are they gonna charge me with killing Jerry too?
translation.it: Mi accuserebbero di aver ucciso anche Jerry?

translation.en: Why not? It's open fucking season.
translation.it: Perché no? La caccia è aperta.

translation.en: So, who are you? How come I've never heard of you?
translation.it: Lei chi è? Perché non la conosco?

translation.en: You've never heard of me
because I make it a practice not to be heard of.
Celebrity lawyers bring too much attention to their clients.
translation.it: Gli avvocati famosi attirano troppa attenzione sui clienti.

translation.en: I don't operate that way.
Now as my case manager explained, Jerry transferred his practice to me.
translation.it: Come le ha spiegato la mia assistente, i casi di Jerry sono passati a me.

translation.en: If you look at the contract of representation you signed with him,
you'll see it allowed Jerry to discuss your case with me.
translation.it: vedrà che Jerry poteva parlare del suo caso con me.

translation.en: Did he? Discuss it with you?
translation.it: E l'ha fatto? Ne ha parlato con lei?

translation.en: No. The point I'm making, Jerry trusted me.
translation.it: No. Ma significa che si fidava di me.

translation.en: It doesn't mean I have to.
translation.it: Non per questo devo farlo io.

translation.en: No, it does not.
-It's Mickey, is it? -That's right.
translation.it: - Lei si chiama Mickey, giusto? - Sì.

translation.en: You play any basketball, Mickey?
-A little bit. -[Trevor] I don't.
Not really.
I love to watch though.
But it always drove me crazy
seeing great players struggle with free throws.
translation.it: quando un bravo giocatore sbaglia i tiri liberi.

translation.en: It's the one thing you can control. Every shot, exactly the same.
translation.it: È la sola cosa che puoi controllare. Non ci sono imprevisti.

translation.en: Take your time, line it up.
translation.it: Fai con calma e prendi la mira.

translation.en: And yet, time and chance happen to them all.
translation.it: Ma a volte sbagliano lo stesso.

translation.en: I don't mean to be an asshole.
Or maybe I do. We were set to go to trial next week.
translation.it: O forse sì. Dovevamo andare a processo tra una settimana.

translation.en: I've been waiting five months to clear my name.
translation.it: Aspetto da cinque mesi di essere scagionato.

translation.en: -I understand. -Do you?
You understand what it's like for an innocent man
translation.it: Capisci cosa significa per un uomo innocente

translation.en: to have to wait and wait to have his day in court?
translation.it: dover aspettare per mesi il proprio processo?

translation.en: To have to read all the lies and the bullshit in the media,
translation.it: Dover leggere bugie e stronzate sui media

translation.en: to have to wear a fucking ankle bracelet 24/7.
translation.it: e dover portare una cavigliera 24 ore su 24?

translation.en: -You understand all of that? -I've dealt with clients wrongly accused.
translation.it: - Capisci tutto questo? - Non è il primo innocente che difendo.

translation.en: Do not handle me.
Okay. I'll get right to the punchline then.
translation.it: Ok. Allora arriverò dritto al punto.

translation.en: Jerry Vincent was an excellent attorney.
translation.it: Jerry Vincent era un ottimo avvocato.

translation.en: -I'm better. -So you say.
translation.it: - Ma io sono migliore. - Lo dici tu.

translation.en: -So would say Jerry. -Maybe. If he were here, which he is not.
translation.it: - Lo direbbe anche lui. - Forse. Ma non è qui.

translation.en: -I get your frustration. -I asked you not to handle me.
translation.it: - Capisco la frustrazione. - Smettila, ho detto.

translation.en: Before I consider you, I need to know you'd be ready next week,
translation.it: Prima di considerarti, devo sapere che sarai pronto in tempo,

translation.en: 'cause I am not pushing this.
Not for another week. Not for another fucking day.
translation.it: Né una settimana né un giorno in più, cazzo.

translation.en: -I could be ready. -You're up to speed on the case?
translation.it: - Posso farcela. - Sei già aggiornato sul caso?

translation.en: I will be. If I'm not prepared, I'll tell you.
But I'm confident you won't have to delay the trial.
translation.it: Ma sono certo che non serviranno rinvii.

translation.en: You're confident you have to tell me that to get the job.
translation.it: Sei certo di dovermelo dire per avere l'incarico.

translation.en: All right.
I need to think about this.
That's a good idea. Have me checked out.
translation.it: Ottima idea. Si informi su di me.

translation.en: Take your time. Not too much.
The longer you wait,
the greater the chance the judge will push your trial back.
translation.it: e più è probabile che il giudice rinvii il processo.

translation.en: If you go with me, I'll make sure that won't happen.
translation.it: Se sceglierà me, farò sì che non accada.

translation.en: Your sales skills are admirable, I'll give you that.
translation.it: Sai venderti molto bene, lo ammetto.

translation.en: Criminal defense is what I do, Mr. Elliott.
I do it very well. You have my numbers.
translation.it: E sono bravo. Ha i miei recapiti.

translation.en: I've lost everything, you understand that, Mickey?
translation.it: Ho perso tutto. Lo capisci, Mickey?

translation.en: My life, my reputation…
translation.it: La mia vita, la mia reputazione…

translation.en: worst of all, my wife.
Who I very much did love.
I get it.
You get nothing. Not yet.
You think you just hit the lottery, but I'm telling you… not yet.
translation.it: Credi di aver vinto la lotteria, ma non è ancora detto.

translation.en: [Lorna over phone] Next week? That is impossible.
[Mickey] It was a deal-breaker.
First, let's land him,
then maybe I can talk him into a continuance.
translation.it: poi proverò a proporgli un rinvio.

translation.en: That has to go.
-What? -Nothing.
translation.it: SE AVESSI TENUTO LA BOCCA CHIUSA, ORA NON SAREI QUI - Cosa? - Niente.

translation.en: I'm gonna need a driver.
I need this time to be going over files.
translation.it: Mi serve tempo per studiare i dossier.

translation.en: I was thinking maybe Quintero. Is he around?
translation.it: Potremmo chiedere a Quintero. È disponibile?

translation.en: Still doing time in Corcoran, I heard.
translation.it: È ancora in carcere a Corcoran.

translation.en: Well, what about Stevie?
Stevie is a terrible driver. Nobody's getting in the car with him.
translation.it: È un pessimo autista. Nessuno vuole andare in auto con lui.

translation.en: All right. Put the word out, will ya?
I'm pulling in. See you in a second.
Jesus. You scared the shit out of me, Cisco.
translation.it: Cristo. Mi hai spaventato a morte, Cisco.

translation.en: What the hell are you even doing here, man?
translation.it: Che diavolo ci fai qui, amico?

translation.en: Lorna said you wanted to hire me.
Not for this, Cisco. To work on the Trevor Elliott case.
translation.it: Non per questo, Cisco. Per aiutarmi col caso Elliott.

translation.en: The police'll handle who killed Jerry Vincent.
You're giving me a heart attack, man.
You could have given me one.
Sorry.
So, Trevor Elliott, huh? That's a big get.
translation.it: E così, Trevor Elliott… È un caso importante.

translation.en: Yeah, if I get him.
I haven't nailed down the gig.
I need to be able to tell him something good.
Something to make him wanna hire me.
Have you seen the file?
Some. Two dead people. He was at the scene. Not exactly stellar.
translation.it: Più o meno. Due vittime. E lui era presente. Non il massimo.

translation.en: Yeah, well, I gotta offer "stellar" somehow.
translation.it: Beh, io devo offrirgli il massimo.

translation.en: Maybe Maggie can give us some inside baseball on the State's case.
translation.it: Forse Maggie può darci qualche dritta sull'accusa.

translation.en: Oh, shit. Maggie.
[Maggie] Damn it.
You can go, Mom. I'll be fine till he gets here.
translation.it: Vai pure, mamma. Lo aspetto da sola.

translation.en: I'm not going.
Think I'm okay to be by myself for a half-hour.
translation.it: Non mi capiterà nulla stando sola mezz'ora.

translation.en: The world hasn't gotten that dangerous.
translation.it: Il mondo non è così pericoloso.

translation.en: -Not happening. -I'm hoping to have a nice time tonight.
translation.it: - Scordatelo. - Vorrei passare una bella serata.

translation.en: My chances are better if Dad's in a good mood,
translation.it: È più facile che accada se papà è allegro

translation.en: and the chances of that are better
translation.it: ed è più facile che lo sia

translation.en: if you don't rip him a new one for being 15 minutes late.
translation.it: se non lo rimproveri di nuovo per 15 minuti di ritardo.

translation.en: There he is.
-[Mickey] I'm sorry. -[Maggie] Really?
Hi, Dad.
Sorry.
Sorry, Mags.
-You look good. Sorry. -You gave me your word. 6:00 p.m.
translation.it: - Stai benissimo. Scusa. - Avevi promesso. Alle 18:00.

translation.en: [Mickey] I know.
You really wanna get back to joint custody? Step one--
Maggie, I'm here now.
How about we deal with you and me later, all right?
translation.it: Discutiamone in un altro momento, ok?

translation.en: -[Maggie] I'll pick you up in the morning. -Okay.
-I love you. -Love you, too.
Hey.
If you're gonna treat me like shit,
have the decency to not look so amazing while doing it.
translation.it: abbi la decenza di non essere così bella.

translation.en: [Hayley] Hello.
-How are you, baby? You good? -I'm good.
translation.it: - Come stai, tesoro? Tutto bene? - Sì.

translation.en: -Ready? Have your bag? -Yeah.
translation.it: - Sei pronta? Hai la borsa? - Sì.

translation.en: [Cisco] He had a sense what was coming, Jerry.
I don't know.
Well, he files a motion ten days ago.
translation.it: Ha presentato l'istanza dieci giorni fa.

translation.en: Transfer his practice in case of his death.
translation.it: Ha ceduto le pratiche in caso di morte.

translation.en: Look, let's just focus on Elliott for now, okay?
translation.it: Per ora concentriamoci su Elliott, ok?

translation.en: Mickey's not really serious about trying this case next week, is he?
translation.it: Mickey non andrà davvero in aula tra una settimana, vero?

translation.en: Technically, it's nine days. Okay, I said the same thing,
translation.it: Tecnicamente sono nove giorni. Ok, l'ho detto anch'io,

translation.en: but cases like this don't come around often.
translation.it: ma certi casi non capitano spesso.

translation.en: And Mickey needs this. He needs something.
translation.it: E ne ha bisogno. Gli serve qualcosa.

translation.en: He's okay with… You know?
translation.it: E accetta il fatto che noi… Lo sai.

translation.en: -I take it you haven't told him. -I just haven't found the right moment.
translation.it: - Non gliel'hai ancora detto. - Non ho trovato il momento giusto.

translation.en: [Hayley] So, you didn't actually go in the water?
translation.it: Quindi non sei entrato in acqua?

translation.en: You know that nightmare I have?
It's not so much of me almost drowning,
translation.it: Non riguarda tanto il fatto che io affoghi,

translation.en: it's of you.
Leaving you behind, that's the part that always gets me.
translation.it: Abbandonarti è ciò che mi fa star male.

translation.en: -Dad… -What?
You had an accident.
You're not the first surfer it's happened to
and I'm not the first kid to have something bad happen to a parent.
translation.it: e a molti ragazzi capita che un genitore abbia un incidente.

translation.en: You are tough. You are tough.
[in English] Don't get quite as tough as her, okay?
translation.it: Non diventare tosta quanto lei, ok?

translation.en: -[chuckles] I'll try not to. -Well, good.
She's worried about you.
She said that?
She thinks it might be some mid-life thing on top of the pills.
translation.it: Crede che, oltre alla dipendenza, tu stia vivendo una crisi di mezz'età.

translation.en: Is it?
Well, maybe a little.
What do you mean?
Mija, two failed marriages, busted law practice,
translation.it: Tesoro, due matrimoni falliti, uno studio legale che va a rotoli,

translation.en: six months in rehab…
You hit the jackpot with your daughter. Come on…
Hey. [chuckles]
When I look back, I always wanted to be a defense lawyer,
translation.it: Se ci ripenso, ho sempre voluto fare l'avvocato difensore,

translation.en: ever since I was a kid watching my dad.
translation.it: sin da quando vedevo mio padre da piccolo.

translation.en: The stuff they teach you in law school, how the system's supposed to work.
translation.it: Ciò che ti insegnano a giurisprudenza, come il sistema dovrebbe funzionare,

translation.en: You get out there and it's all just muddy.
translation.it: nella vita reale è tutto più confuso.

translation.en: Everybody's working an angle.
Everybody lies.
After a while you wonder if you're doing any good at all.
translation.it: Dopo un po' ti chiedi se ciò che fai serva a qualcosa.

translation.en: You know Mom never feels that way, right? She just puts bad people away.
translation.it: Sai che la mamma non si sente mai così? Lei sbatte in prigione i cattivi.

translation.en: Your mom's a true believer.
That's what makes her so great at what she does.
translation.it: Per questo è così brava in ciò che fa.

translation.en: But you're not?
I was. I think I still am.
translation.it: Lo ero. Forse lo sono ancora.

translation.en: Look, I believe that in our system, everyone is innocent until proven guilty.
translation.it: Io credo che nel nostro sistema siamo tutti innocenti fino a prova contraria

translation.en: Now, when the State points the finger at you,
translation.it: e, quando lo Stato ti accusa di qualcosa,

translation.en: well, I'm all you got.
translation.it: io sono tutto ciò che hai.

translation.en: Now what?
Are you kidding me?
Sorry to intrude.
This better be good, Detective.
It's important.
We really gotta see Jerry Vincent's files.
translation.it: Dobbiamo vedere i dossier di Jerry Vincent.

translation.en: I realize you have attorney-client privilege.
DA says you probably have the right to shut us down.
translation.it: e il procuratore ha confermato che può impedircelo.

translation.en: Seriously? I knew this guy.
I really need you to see what we're up against.
translation.it: Deve vedere con cosa abbiamo a che fare.

translation.en: It's a kill shot to the head, very clean.
translation.it: Gli hanno sparato alla testa. Un colpo pulito.

translation.en: Whoever pulled the trigger picked up the shell casings too.
translation.it: Chi ha sparato ha anche raccolto i bossoli.

translation.en: Someone targeted Jerry Vincent
and they didn't take his wallet or his cash.
translation.it: e non hanno portato via i soldi o il portafogli,

translation.en: They took his bag with his laptop.
translation.it: ma la valigetta col suo portatile.

translation.en: Now, the question is, what was on there? What did he know that got him killed?
translation.it: Ora, la domanda è: "Cosa conteneva? Cosa sapeva che gli è costato la vita?"

translation.en: If the answer's any place, it's probably in his files.
translation.it: Se la risposta è da qualche parte, è in quei dossier.

translation.en: I wish I could help you, Detective, I really do.
I'm asking you to help yourself.
translation.it: Le sto chiedendo di aiutare se stesso.

translation.en: You're at risk, Counselor.
You could be next.
[Cisco] Was Jerry involved with wise guys or cartel guys?
translation.it: Jerry era coinvolto con la mafia o qualche cartello?

translation.en: I doubt it, he was straight ahead.
translation.it: Ne dubito. Era un tipo onesto.

translation.en: -Ex-prosecutor. -Maybe it's someone he put in prison.
translation.it: - Ex pubblico ministero. - Qualcuno che ha sbattuto dentro?

translation.en: One second.
Yeah, I thought about that. Comb through the files.
translation.it: Sì, ci avevo pensato. Analizza quei dossier.

translation.en: Look for any hint of threats, clients, ex-clients, everybody, all right?
translation.it: Cerca ogni traccia di minaccia, clienti, ex clienti, chiunque, ok?

translation.en: I'm on it.
In the meantime, Elliott gave us access
translation.it: Intanto Elliott ci ha dato accesso

translation.en: to his house in Malibu where the murders happened.
translation.it: alla scena del crimine, la casa di Malibu.

translation.en: It's important we get a true picture.
I'll shoot you the address. Let's meet there around noon.
translation.it: Ti mando l'indirizzo. Vediamoci lì a mezzogiorno.

translation.en: This means we have the case?
Not yet. The more we learn the better our chances.
translation.it: Non ancora. Più scopriremo, più sarà probabile.

translation.en: -Where are you right now? -Heading into trial.
-Oh! Mickey! -Thanks for coming. I appreciate this.
translation.it: - Mickey! - Grazie di essere venuto. Davvero.

translation.en: Why wouldn't I?
When the greatest person I ever met asks for my help,
translation.it: Quando l'uomo migliore che conosca chiede il mio aiuto,

translation.en: I give my help.
How's Eleanor?
Oh, she's absolutely fantastic is how she is. And she sends her love.
translation.it: Sta alla grande. Ti manda un bacio.

translation.en: Send my love to her. Thank you. [woman] LA-292587. People vs. Izzy Letts.
translation.it: - Ricambia. Grazie. - LA-292587. Lo Stato contro Izzy Letts.

translation.en: Be with you in a second.
Mickey Haller, Judge, asks that we approach?
Please tell me you're ready.
-Almost, Judge. -[Wallace] Mr. Haller.
Actually, Judge.
At the risk of further antagonizing Mr. Holt,
translation.it: a rischio di inimicarmi il sig. Holt,

translation.en: maybe we call him up for the sidebar?
-Excuse me? -What's going on?
A bit unorthodox, but in the best interests
translation.it: È insolito, ma lo faccio per salvaguardare

translation.en: of judicial economy and justice.
Take 30 seconds.
Mr. Holt.
Could you approach the bench?
How you doin'? All right, I'll make this quick.
translation.it: Come sta? Sarà una cosa veloce.

translation.en: My client is charged with grand theft.
translation.it: L'accusa è di furto di preziosi.

translation.en: Which under Section 487 of the Penal Code
translation.it: Secondo la sezione 487 del Codice Penale

translation.en: means the value of the stolen object exceeds $950.
translation.it: significa che il valore dell'oggetto deve superare i 950 dollari.

translation.en: Your Honor, that necklace is worth what, $400, tops?
translation.it: Vostro Onore, quella collana varrà al massimo 400 dollari.

translation.en: What?
I've taken few payments in diamonds and gold,
translation.it: Mi hanno pagato in oro e diamanti,

translation.en: developed a pretty good eye.
translation.it: e ho occhio per certe cose.

translation.en: But to be sure, Judge,
I also brought with me an expert on the matter.
translation.it: ho portato un esperto in materia.

translation.en: That is Marvin Beedleman. He's a jeweler.
He can give us a pretty quick appraisal.
The District Attorney might want to get one of her own.
translation.it: L'accusa può convocare un altro esperto.

translation.en: Guessing your wife doesn't know it's a knock-off?
translation.it: Sua moglie non sa che è un falso, eh?

translation.en: I, of course, don't want to upset her.
Are you kidding me?
I am not. I am not.
Even if it is a knock-off, the defendant thought she was stealing the real thing.
translation.it: Anche se la collana fosse falsa, l'accusata la credeva vera.

translation.en: You have a witness to testify as to her state of mind?
translation.it: Ha un testimone per il suo stato mentale?

translation.en: Did you not have the necklace appraised?
translation.it: Non ha fatto valutare la collana?

translation.en: We have the appraisal from his insurance company.
Might open up a whole new can of fraud.
translation.it: Quindi si potrebbe parlare di frode?

translation.en: I could be wrong, of course.
Miss Shepard, any thoughts on how you might like to play this?
Completely dismissed? I get to just go?
Well, unless the DA decides to prosecute the Holts
translation.it: Sempre che il procuratore non voglia accusare gli Holt

translation.en: and you get called as a witness against them,
but I don't think that'll happen.
Oh, my God.
Didn't even have to get up there
and testify as to what a nice person you are.
translation.it: dovuto dirgli che brava persona è.

translation.en: [chuckles] I don't know how to thank you. I will pay you one day, I promise.
translation.it: Non so come ringraziarla. Giuro che un giorno la pagherò.

translation.en: You pay me now.
I'm broke. I don't have a nickel to my name.
translation.it: Sono al verde. Non ho un soldo.

translation.en: Have a driver's license?
Excuse me?
[Lorna] What do you mean you hired her?
I told you I needed a driver, and she can drive.
translation.it: Mi serviva un autista e lei sa guidare.

translation.en: I'm actually a good driver.
She's actually a good driver, Lorna.
[Lorna] It wouldn't kill you to work from an office.
translation.it: Non ti ucciderebbe lavorare in studio. Mi sentirei in gabbia.

translation.en: Too much structure. I gotta work while I'm on the move.
translation.it: Mi sentirei in gabbia. Preferisco lavorare in movimento.

translation.en: -Didn't you say she's an addict? -Former. Who am I to judge? Turn right.
translation.it: - Non è una tossica? - Ex. Chi sono per giudicare? A destra.

translation.en: I'm almost there. Call you back.
Mickey, no-- [groans]
-Maggie. -Hi, Lorna. Nice to see you.
Um, thank you, and likewise. You look pretty.
translation.it: Grazie. Anche per me. Sei in forma.

translation.en: Something I can help you with?
We both care for him, Lorna.
And I mean, I'm happy
for all this positive turn of events for Mickey…
translation.it: che ora le cose sembrino andargli bene…

translation.en: But?
But taking over a high-profile murder for a lawyer who was just gunned down
translation.it: Ma subentrare in un caso di omicidio al posto di un avvocato ucciso

translation.en: for God knows what reason, do we really think this is a good idea?
translation.it: per chissà quale ragione ti sembra una buona idea?

translation.en: The wolf is at the door, Maggie.
I have been holding his practice together with string and glue.
translation.it: Ho tenuto insieme lo studio con colla e spago.

translation.en: His life is bigger than just his law career.
translation.it: La sua vita va oltre la carriera.

translation.en: He needs to get back on his feet first. His daughter needs him back on his feet.
translation.it: Deve prima rimettersi in sesto. Sua figlia ne ha bisogno.

translation.en: I know, and this could be the thing that gets him there.
translation.it: Lo so e questo potrebbe aiutarlo.

translation.en: For the first time in a year, he's alive again.
translation.it: Dopo un anno, si sente finalmente vivo.

translation.en: And you know Mickey.
The only thing he likes more than a fight
translation.it: La sola cosa che ama più di una battaglia

translation.en: is a fight with one hand tied behind his back.
translation.it: è una battaglia dove parte svantaggiato.

translation.en: [Mickey] I'll be about 15 minutes.
[Izzy] Sounds good.
Welcome to the jungle.
Remind me. We're never bringing the jury here.
translation.it: Ricordami di non portare qui la giuria.

translation.en: They'll hate this guy and we're doomed.
[Cisco] Wife was there on the bed.
Boyfriend there on the floor.
Police think Elliott stood at the door. Maybe watching them fuck--
translation.it: Secondo la polizia, Elliott è arrivato, li ha visti scopare…

translation.en: Fornicate for a while before he came in and shot 'em.
translation.it: Li ha visti fornicare per un po' prima di entrare e sparare.

translation.en: [Mickey] Murder weapon was never found.
Probably out there in the ocean.
I don't know, Mick. You're good, but this good?
translation.it: Non lo so, Mick. Sei bravo, ma così tanto?

translation.en: If they could place Elliott here.
translation.it: Se confermeranno che lui era qui

translation.en: Motive all over. Positive gunshot residue.
translation.it: e il movente, i residui dello sparo…

translation.en: Has he given you his story?
translation.it: Ti ha dato la sua versione?

translation.en: Hey, listen, there's something else.
What?
I know you're okay with me seeing Lorna and shit.
translation.it: So che ti sta bene che io frequenti Lorna,

translation.en: At least you say you're okay with it.
Lorna's been meaning to tell you when the time is right,
translation.it: Lorna voleva dirtelo al momento giusto,

translation.en: but somehow,
I suspect the time might never be right for her,
translation.it: sospetto che non troverà mai il momento giusto

translation.en: so I'm just gonna say it.
translation.it: e quindi te lo dico io.

translation.en: Me and Lorna,
we're gonna get married.
What do you mean, "Ah"? What is "Ah"? Is it okay with you?
translation.it: Come sarebbe a dire "ah"? Che significa? Sei d'accordo?

translation.en: I'm not part of the equation, Cisco.
translation.it: Io sono fuori dai giochi, Cisco.

translation.en: But I wanna know, is it okay with you?
translation.it: Ma voglio sapere se sei d'accordo.

translation.en: Do you love her?
With all my heart.
Then it's all right with me.
But I'll tell you, Cisco.
She's one of the four most important people in my life.
translation.it: Lei è tra le quattro persone più importanti per me.

translation.en: -Should you ever hurt her-- -Of course I would never.
translation.it: - Se le farai del male… - Non lo farei mai.

translation.en: She's the greatest thing ever.
Who's the fourth?
What?
You said four people.
Hayley, Maggie, Lorna and--
Who's the fourth?
Yes, uh… Yes, I'll be there.
Trevor Elliott has summoned me.
[Trevor] You checked out well.
High-performing trial lawyer, much better than Jerry according to most.
translation.it: Eri un avvocato di livello. Secondo molti, migliore di Jerry.

translation.en: Until you went off the deep end and became a drug addict.
translation.it: Finché non hai toccato il fondo diventando un tossico.

translation.en: I'm not an addict now.
Listen, Mickey. The thing about this case,
translation.it: Ascolta, Mickey. Il problema di questo caso

translation.en: I need to win it in court
translation.it: è che devo vincere in aula

translation.en: and I need to win in the court of public opinion.
translation.it: e devo vincere davanti all'opinione pubblica.

translation.en: The world is quick to cancel these days.
Just take a look at my Twitter feed.
translation.it: Basta vedere il mio account Twitter.

translation.en: I need a lawyer who can get me my freedom back
and my name back.
Are you that lawyer?
No, all I can do is get you a "Not guilty."
I can't deliver you a finding of innocent.
The courts don't work that way. Not guilty, best I can do.
translation.it: Il tribunale non funziona così. Avrai il "non colpevole".

translation.en: And you can get that? For sure?
Depends on what I have to work with.
translation.it: Dipende da cosa ho per le mani.

translation.en: -I didn't kill them. -I didn't ask you.
translation.it: - Non li ho uccisi. - Non l'ho chiesto.

translation.en: But I need you to know, I didn't.
translation.it: Ma devi sapere che non l'ho fatto.

translation.en: All right, here's the deal, Trevor.
I can win almost any case as long as I know what I'm dealing with.
translation.it: Posso vincere quasi ogni caso se so con cosa ho a che fare.

translation.en: Right now, I don't.
So you lie to me,
I don't want your case, however much I might need it.
translation.it: non accetterò il tuo caso anche avendone bisogno.

translation.en: Okay.
I was as far from cool as you can get in high school.
translation.it: Al liceo ero considerato un vero nerd.

translation.en: Girls wouldn't give me the time of day, but I could always talk to Zelda.
translation.it: Le ragazze non mi consideravano, ma potevo parlare con Zelda.

translation.en: Real life sucked.
But video games, they mattered.
Then I met Lara.
She was different. She was beautiful, she was brilliant.
translation.it: Lei era diversa. Bellissima e brillante.

translation.en: And she loved me.
We're just out of grad school, the game industry was exploding.
translation.it: Finito il master, l'industria dei videogiochi prosperava,

translation.en: But the problem that nobody could get around was the uncanny valley.
translation.it: ma nessuno riusciva a superare la uncanny valley.

translation.en: Uncanny what?
If you're trying to make something humanlike,
translation.it: Se vuoi creare qualcosa di realistico,

translation.en: the human brain will reject it unless it's almost perfect.
translation.it: il cervello umano pretende la perfezione.

translation.en: You know, video game characters were close to real,
translation.it: I personaggi dei videogiochi erano realistici,

translation.en: but not close enough.
Especially in the eyes, the eyes always gave it away.
But the closer the characters resemble us,
translation.it: Ma più i personaggi ci assomigliano,

translation.en: the more connection we feel, the more we wanna play.
translation.it: più ci sentiamo legati a essi e più vogliamo giocare.

translation.en: That's the uncanny valley. And I was the one who crossed it.
translation.it: Quella è la uncanny valley. E io l'ho superata.

translation.en: Working out of my garage.
One script, maybe 100 lines of code,
changed everything.
The girl in the game.
That was our first big hit.
It's what put us on the map.
And, yes, I modeled the character after Lara.
translation.it: E sì, è ispirata a Lara.

translation.en: It's fair to say that her DNA
translation.it: Posso dire che il suo DNA

translation.en: is in everything this company has ever done.
translation.it: è in tutto ciò che la compagnia ha fatto.

translation.en: We were a team.
I didn't know she was cheating on me.
Looking back at it, I was working all the time,
I was traveling too much, and she grew resentful.
translation.it: viaggiavo troppo e lei ha iniziato a provare rancore.

translation.en: Angry.
I went out to the house that day to surprise her.
translation.it: Quel giorno volevo farle una sorpresa.

translation.en: And instead…
I will never get that out of my head as long as I live.
translation.it: Non riuscirò a dimenticarlo finché avrò vita.

translation.en: I found her like that. My own wife. My best friend.
translation.it: L'ho trovata così. Mia moglie. La mia migliore amica.

translation.en: And that fucking yoga instructor.
translation.it: E il suo istruttore di yoga.

translation.en: And everyone thinks I killed her,
but the truth is if I had found them alive,
translation.it: ma la verità è che se li avessi trovati vivi

translation.en: I wouldn't even have left her.
I would have begged her to come back to me because I need her.
translation.it: L'avrei pregata di tornare da me perché avevo bisogno di lei.

translation.en: People say I'm a genius. The code I wrote, they call it magic.
translation.it: La gente mi ritiene un genio. Dicono che il mio codice è pura magia.

translation.en: Lara was the magic. She was the inspiration.
Without her, I would still be sitting in my garage.
translation.it: Senza di lei, sarei ancora nel mio garage.

translation.en: I never could have killed her
because without her…
I have no magic.
That's what you're dealing with. Can you work with that?
translation.it: Ecco con cosa hai a che fare. Puoi farcela?

translation.en: I can win with that.
-You can win with that? -I can.
-You can win with that next week? -I can.
translation.it: - Puoi vincere la prossima settimana? - Sì.

translation.en: Then you're hired.
-[Lorna] Well? -We got it.
-We got the case? -Lots of work to do, Lorna.
translation.it: - Davvero? - Dovremo darci da fare, Lorna.

translation.en: -We need to keep our heads. -Oh, my God.
Lots of work. Tell Cisco to meet me at the office.
translation.it: Ci sarà da lavorare. Fai venire Cisco in ufficio.

translation.en: See you in a few.
You okay?
Your eyes look like they're about to cry.
translation.it: Sembra che tu stia per piangere.

translation.en: Uh, just allergies.
Your eyes should be on the road, by the way.
You really okay?
Never been better. Take the turn up here, will you?
translation.it: Mai stato meglio. Svolta lì, ok?

translation.en: What? Is something wrong?
Yeah, we're being followed.
